body:
Now that #12207 is merged, most commands work fine on BW. However, I discovered a new bug with our Python 2.6 support.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install zlib
```

### Information on your system

This problem occurs on Cray CNL5 (Blue Waters) when running Spack with the system Python 2.6.9.

A workaround for this bug is to `module load bwpy` and use a newer version of Python.

@tgamblin @alalazo
title: Python 2.6 support broken on Blue Waters
